snippet: Top-seeded Juan Martín del Potro won his third Citi Open title in Washington by beating eighth-seeded John Isner, 3-6, 6-1, 6-2.
abstract: Juan Martin del Potro defeats John Isner to win his third Citi Open tennis title in Washington; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Juan Martín del Potro won his third Citi Open title in Washington by beating eighth-seeded John Isner, 3-6, 6-1, 6-2.

headline.main: Del Potro Solves Isner to Win Citi Open
